surfaces.name: Operation and Filter vocabularies
surfaces.claims: 196 Operations and 93 Filters harvested from this host's libsandbox; IDs and names are fixed for this world.
surfaces.limits: Runtime coverage today is concentrated on file-read*, file-write*, and mach-lookup; other ops are vocab-only until probed.

surfaces.name: Modern format/tag-layout subset
surfaces.claims: Modern compiled profile format with tag layouts for the literal/regex-bearing tags exercised by canonical system profiles.
surfaces.limits: Unmodeled tags and non-literal/regex payloads remain heuristic; covered layouts are bounded to the subset used in canonical profiles.

surfaces.name: Canonical system profiles
surfaces.claims: Compiled blobs for sys:airlock, sys:bsd, and sys:sample with digests, static checks, and attestations tied to this world.
surfaces.limits: Apply gates limit end-to-end runtime on this host; drift demotes status until regenerated.
